channel.title: Make the interaction between Puppet Strings and Exhume more interesting
channel.description:
If Possessor uses Puppet Strings to force X to kill Y, I propose that Exhume on Y identifies the killer as (the class of) X.
This way, Possessor has room to counter Exhume, which at the moment is infallible.
This would also make sense lore-wise.

item.title: Make the interaction between Puppet Strings and Exhume more interesting
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Because NK. You should die within 1-3 nights of claiming 66% of the time and the remaining 33% has a Possessor who can get all of the whispers from you

Read full topic
item.source: Make the interaction between Puppet Strings and Exhume more interesting

item.title: Make the interaction between Puppet Strings and Exhume more interesting
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
The Prince out strat still works, I do it D3 every time I play Prince and it works really well. Not sure why it isn’t more common.

item.title: Make the interaction between Puppet Strings and Exhume more interesting
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
That discourages whispers too much. We can’t have a killer bypassing healing and reading all whispers at the same time.

item.title: Make the interaction between Puppet Strings and Exhume more interesting
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
The Possessor’s whisper reading ability should be removed from Puppet Strings and added to Driven as a passive Gossip.

Change my mind.

item.title: Make the interaction between Puppet Strings and Exhume more interesting
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Possessor can already counter whisper meta by possessing King, but there is risk. It seems a bit silly to me to let Possessor freely read all whispers to and from King D2. King would be absolutely paralyzed.

Read full topic

look at league of legends

item.title: Make the interaction between Puppet Strings and Exhume more interesting
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The issue with adding more NK’s is that more of them makes each one less likely meaning that people are less likely to care about the strengths of each NK when making decisions before the NK is known

Read full topic

item.title: Make the interaction between Puppet Strings and Exhume more interesting
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Tbh I want your chat history and class-identifying thing to replace, not just be added to, the realtime whisper reading thing.

The only reason whisper reading exists for Poss anyway is to counter the possword meta (which I believe is universally and unanimously disliked)

Read full topic
